description: Number of 3 X n binary matrices such that any 2 rows have a common 1.
references: V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6).
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (23,-194,712,-960).
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda
